gulibati {lr~uwmu
fiY^ >adonaY {lo>aroDi wahum m~in[ baEodi galabihimo sayagolibuwna
fiY biDoEi siniyna lil~ahi {lo>amoru min qabolu wamin[ baEodu wayawoma}i*K yaforaHu {lomu&ominuwna

waEoda {ll~ahi laA yuxolifu {ll~ahu waEodahu, wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna

>awalamo yatafak~aruwA@ fiY^ >anfusihim m~aA xalaqa {ll~ahu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa wamaA bayonahumaA^ <il~aA bi{loHaq~i wa>ajalK m~usam~FY wa<in~a kaviyrFA m~ina {ln~aAsi biliqaA^}i rab~ihimo laka`firuwna

>awalamo yasiyruwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi fayanZuruwA@ kayofa kaAna Ea`qibapu {l~a*iyna min qabolihimo kaAnuw^A@ >a$ad~a minohumo quw~apF wa>avaAruwA@ {lo>aroDa waEamaruwhaA^ >akovara mim~aA EamaruwhaA wajaA^'atohumo rusuluhum bi{lobay~ina`ti famaA kaAna {ll~ahu liyaZolimahumo wala`kin kaAnuw^A@ >anfusahumo yaZolimuwna
vum~a kaAna Ea`qibapa {l~a*iyna >asa`^_#uwA@ {ls~uw^>aY`^ >an ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`ti {ll~ahi wakaAnuwA@ bihaA yasotahozi'uwna

wamino 'aAya`tihi.^ >ano xalaqakum m~in turaAbK vum~a <i*aA^ >antum ba$arN tanta$iruwna
wamino 'aAya`tihi.^ >ano xalaqa lakum m~ino >anfusikumo >azowa`jFA l~itasokunuw^A@ <ilayohaA wajaEala bayonakum m~awad~apF waraHomapF <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yatafak~aruwna
wamino 'aAya`tihi. xaloqu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wa{xotila`fu >alosinatikumo wa>alowa`nikumo <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iloEa`limiyna
wamino 'aAya`tihi. manaAmukum bi{l~ayoli wa{ln~ahaAri wa{botigaA^&ukum m~in faDolihi.^ <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yasomaEuwna
wamino 'aAya`tihi. yuriykumu {lobaroqa xawofFA waTamaEFA wayunaz~ilu mina {ls~amaA^'i maA^'F fayuHoYi. bihi {lo>aroDa baEoda mawotihaA^ <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yaEoqiluwna
wamino 'aAya`tihi.^ >an taquwma {ls~amaA^'u wa{lo>aroDu bi>amorihi. vum~a <i*aA daEaAkumo daEowapF m~ina {lo>aroDi <i*aA^ >antumo taxorujuwna
walahu, man fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi kul~N l~ahu, qa`nituwna
wahuwa {l~a*iY yaboda&uA@ {loxaloqa vum~a yuEiyduhu, wahuwa >ahowanu Ealayohi walahu {lomavalu {lo>aEolaY` fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wahuwa {loEaziyzu {loHakiymu

Daraba lakum m~avalFA m~ino >anfusikumo hal l~akum m~in m~aA malakato >ayoma`nukum m~in $urakaA^'a fiY maA razaqona`kumo fa>antumo fiyhi sawaA^'N taxaAfuwnahumo kaxiyfatikumo >anfusakumo ka*a`lika nufaS~ilu {lo'aAya`ti liqawomK yaEoqiluwna

fa>aqimo wajohaka lild~iyni HaniyfFA fiTorata {ll~ahi {l~atiY faTara {ln~aAsa EalayohaA laA tabodiyla lixaloqi {ll~ahi *a`lika {ld~iynu {loqay~imu wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna

mina {l~a*iyna far~aquwA@ diynahumo wakaAnuwA@ $iyaEFA kul~u HizobK] bimaA ladayohimo fariHuwna
wa<i*aA mas~a {ln~aAsa Dur~N daEawoA@ rab~ahum m~uniybiyna <ilayohi vum~a <i*aA^ >a*aAqahum m~inohu raHomapF <i*aA fariyqN m~inohum birab~ihimo yu$orikuwna
liyakofuruwA@ bimaA^ 'aAtayona`humo fatamat~aEuwA@ fasawofa taEolamuwna
>amo >anzalonaA Ealayohimo suloTa`nFA fahuwa yatakal~amu bimaA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yu$orikuwna
wa<i*aA^ >a*aqonaA {ln~aAsa raHomapF fariHuwA@ bihaA wa<in tuSibohumo say~i}apN[ bimaA qad~amato >ayodiyhimo <i*aA humo yaqonaTuwna
>awalamo yarawoA@ >an~a {ll~aha yabosuTu {lr~izoqa liman ya$aA^'u wayaqodiru <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yu&ominuwna
fa_#aAti *aA {loqurobaY` Haq~ahu, wa{lomisokiyna wa{bona {ls~abiyli *a`lika xayorN l~il~a*iyna yuriyduwna wajoha {ll~ahi wa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomufoliHuwna
wamaA^ 'aAtayotum m~in r~ibFA l~iyarobuwaA@ fiY^ >amowa`li {ln~aAsi falaA yarobuwA@ Einda {ll~ahi wamaA^ 'aAtayotum m~in zakaw`pK turiyduwna wajoha {ll~ahi fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomuDoEifuwna
{ll~ahu {l~a*iY xalaqakumo vum~a razaqakumo vum~a yumiytukumo vum~a yuHoyiykumo halo min $urakaA^}ikum m~an yafoEalu min *a`likum m~in $aYo'K suboHa`nahu, wataEa`laY` Eam~aA yu$orikuwna
Zahara {lofasaAdu fiY {lobar~i wa{lobaHori bimaA kasabato >ayodiY {ln~aAsi liyu*iyqahum baEoDa {l~a*iY EamiluwA@ laEal~ahumo yarojiEuwna

man kafara faEalayohi kuforuhu, wamano Eamila Sa`liHFA fali>anfusihimo yamohaduwna
liyajoziYa {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti min faDolihi.^ <in~ahu, laA yuHib~u {loka`firiyna
wamino 'aAya`tihi.^ >an yurosila {lr~iyaAHa muba$~ira`tK waliyu*iyqakum m~in r~aHomatihi. walitajoriYa {lofuloku bi>amorihi. walitabotaguwA@ min faDolihi. walaEal~akumo ta$okuruwna
walaqado >arosalonaA min qabolika rusulFA <ilaY` qawomihimo fajaA^'uwhum bi{lobay~ina`ti fa{ntaqamonaA mina {l~a*iyna >ajoramuwA@ wakaAna Haq~FA EalayonaA naSoru {lomu&ominiyna

{ll~ahu {l~a*iY yurosilu {lr~iya`Ha fatuviyru saHaAbFA fayabosuTuhu, fiY {ls~amaA^'i kayofa ya$aA^'u wayajoEaluhu, kisafFA fataraY {lowadoqa yaxoruju mino xila`lihi. fa<i*aA^ >aSaAba bihi. man ya$aA^'u mino EibaAdihi.^ <i*aA humo yasotabo$iruwna
wa<in kaAnuwA@ min qaboli >an yunaz~ala Ealayohim m~in qabolihi. lamubolisiyna
fa{nZuro <ilaY`^ 'aAva`ri raHomati {ll~ahi kayofa yuHoYi {lo>aroDa baEoda mawotihaA^ <in~a *a`lika lamuHoYi {lomawotaY` wahuwa EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN
wala}ino >arosalonaA riyHFA fara>awohu muSofar~FA l~aZal~uwA@ min[ baEodihi. yakofuruwna
